fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Douse someone in gasoline each night.
- You may Ignite at night, dealing all Doused players an Astral Unstoppable Attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will passively Douse anyone that visits you.
- If you take no action, you will attempt to clean any gasoline off yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
